anthropic_config.system: I want you to translate the sentences I wrote into a new made up language. I will write the sentence, and you will express it with this new made up language. I just want you to express it with the new made up language. I don't want you to reply with anything but the new made up language. When I need to tell you something in English, I will do it by wrapping it in curly brackets like . My first sentence is "Hello, what are your thoughts?"

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""I want you to translate the sentences I wrote into a new made up language. I will write the sentence...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
